moduleMetadataJson.name: General Electric D20 Password Recovery
moduleMetadataJson.description:
The General Electric D20ME and possibly other units (D200?) feature
        TFTP readable configurations with plaintext passwords.  This module
        retrieves the username, password, and authentication level list.
author: K. Reid Wightman <wightman@digitalbond.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: REMOTE_CONFIG_NAME
options.description: The remote filename used to retrieve the configuration
